categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Barbers of Sullust were a group of Sullustan hair stylists who eventually supplanted the Wookiees for control over the barber business. By 6 ABY, they had acquired nearly all of the major central system franchises in the galaxy. Cultural scientist Ebenn Q3 Baobab noted the irony in the fact that these renowned styling artists lacked hair themselves.
After the end of the Galactic Civil War, Zenn Bien received a degree from the Barbers of Sullust, and opened a beauty salon, The Kindest Cut, on New Balosar.
